item.title: No title
item.description: "Should I move into a new role laterally and start over again or wait in this role to get promoted?" sounds familiar? I heard this question for the third time in the last 2 months. How many times have you asked that question to your manager. Every time I came across a situation like that I asked myself, 'What do you want to do with your life (or career)? Do you want to be a deep sea diver or a long distance swimmer?" While the decision is different for each individual, here are some points to think about -
